title: can't duo says they are ineligible... confirmed we are all in plat last season
body: tried 3 different people we all relogged still same bugged message

replies.body: There is now a red flag on this topic in the server warnings area. They're working on a fix.

Did any of you get punished and lose Ranked rewards? People that lose their Rewards will be counted as Unranked for placement purposes (Unranked can queue with Bronze-Gold). Your MMR isn't harmed, so after placements it's likely you guys can group again, unless your MMR was so different that some of you get into Plat and some into Silver.
